DOC.brief_title: Improved Estimation GFR Cystatin C Preventing Contrast Induced Nephropathy NAC Zn
DOC.detailed_description: In prospective , placebo-controlled , double blind trial patient moderate impaired kidney function receive hypoosmolar , nonionic contrast medium randomly assign oral treatment 2 day 1.2g/day NAC ( n=19 ) , 1 day 60mg/day Zn ( n=18 ) placebo ( n=17 ) . All patient periprocedural hydrate 1ml/kg/h 0.45 % saline 24h . At baseline ( hydration ) , prior exposure CM well 2 6 day CM serum level creatinine cystatin C measure .
DOC.criteria: 1. old 18 year age , 2. serum creatinine > 1.2 mg/dl creatinine clearance < 50 ml/min ( measure 12 24 hour urine collection ) . 1. acute inflammatory disease , 2. medication NSAID metformin 3 day enter study , 3. abnormal finding physical examination , e.g . sign dehydration decompensated heart failure .
